name: A Brighter Future
description:
A Brighter Future is a small strategy game in which every action you take can lead to different outcomes in the future.  While you play, you will be able to see the present and the future simultaneously (although you'll only have control over the present).

The game was developed for the MiniJam 63: Future.

Rules

The rules are very simple: You have a limited stack of tiles (with houses, farms, factories, rocks, and more!). You draw three at a time, place one, and discard the other two. Each tile you place can have an impact in the outcome of humanity, and you will be able to see it in the future viewport.

There are Four possible outcomes to discover!
